pages.text: Harpacanthus is a Carboniferous holocephalian from the Bear Gulch Limestone of Montana. It is a small chondrichtyan, with a slender body and had characteristic "antlers" on the tip of its head that have an unknown usage.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
